title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.

Ignore the post is higher than any other categories with value 40.0, followed by , and Comment on/ reply to the post. Down to category Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) with the lowest value of 6.0.
The highest value at Ignore the post is almost 6.67 times larger than the minimum value of Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
The highest value at Ignore the post is almost 6.67 times larger than the minimum value of Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
The difference between the max Response Ignore the post and min Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) is 34.0.
